formalpara.title: Figure 1. The canonical Wnt/β-catenin pathway.
formalpara.para: Binding of Wnt to the receptors Frizzled (Fz) and LRP6 leads to inhibition of β-catenin degradation. β-catenin in turn interacts with members of the TCF/Lef-1 family of transcription factors to co-activate target gene transcription.
